name: Path of the Dragon
description:
This game was submitted for the Women Game Jam 2021.

Tamilay is a druid, but a special kind of druid, a dragon druid. She decides to begin the unification of the Techno-Tribes in a desperate attempt to save her kind and the rest of the druids from evil in this fantasy-heavy, cyberpunk world.

Credits:

Code: Sharon Nauberg

Narrative: Flo Del Pino

Sound: Clara Zivano

Visuals: Patricia Castillo Molina

Direction: Perpetua Franck
